en.today: You'll ride the waves of many emotions, dear Aries, as the Pisces moon aspects Mercury, Jupiter, Saturn, Venus, Uranus, and Neptune throughout the day. Focus on what gives you a sense of joy and power to make these vibes work in your favor. Seclusion may be necessary at times, especially if you're working toward closure or changing certain behaviors. Mercury ends its retrograde motion, forcing us to face information or conversations that have been swept under the rug. Meanwhile, Venus and Uranus face off, conjuring unexpected tension within matters of the heart. Avoid obsessing or jumping to conclusions if interactions or new information catch you off guard. Enjoy a boost to your popularity this evening once Luna enters your sign and aspects Pluto.

en.today: The Pisces moon aligns with Jupiter and Saturn this morning, dear Taurus, strengthening your desire for connection and notoriety. Build your professional network by putting yourself out there, both online and in your local community. Mercury stations direct in your solar seventh house, alleviating romantic dramas that have played out these past few weeks. However, as Venus and Uranus face off, you could encounter one major blowout before peace finally takes hold. Ask a trusted ally for advice if you need a second opinion while Luna chimes in and connects with Neptune. You'll require space to reflect once the moon enters Aries this evening and aspects Pluto.
